title: Remove upper section from bill receipt, keep 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' and below

requirements.summary: Remove all content above the 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' text in the printed bill receipt, keeping only the 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' line and everything below it
acceptanceCriteria: The printed bill shows 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' as the topmost element
All content that previously appeared above 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' is removed
All content below 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' remains intact and functional

file_operations.description: Remove all JSX elements and content that render above the 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' text in the bill receipt. Ensure the 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' line becomes the first visible element in the printed output, and preserve all subsequent content including line items, totals, taxes, discounts, and footer information. Maintain existing print styling and layout for the retained content.
